about_the_game:
Put your driving talents to the test with 6 new races and a new car for WRC 5!

  • 6 new special stages for the following rallies: LOTOS 72nd Rally poland, Neste Oil Rally Finland, ADAC Rallye Deutschland, Coates Hire Rally Australia, Tour de Corse Rallye de France, RallyRACC Catalunya-Costa Daurada, Wales Rally GB.
  • The WRC Concept Car E2, a new WRC-class car created exclusively for the official FIA World Rally Championship video game.

This content can be used in Quick Rally and Quick Stage modes.
detailed_description:
Put your driving talents to the test with 6 new races and a new car for WRC 5!

  • 6 new special stages for the following rallies: LOTOS 72nd Rally poland, Neste Oil Rally Finland, ADAC Rallye Deutschland, Coates Hire Rally Australia, Tour de Corse Rallye de France, RallyRACC Catalunya-Costa Daurada, Wales Rally GB.
  • The WRC Concept Car E2, a new WRC-class car created exclusively for the official FIA World Rally Championship video game.

This content can be used in Quick Rally and Quick Stage modes.

name: WRC 5 - WRC eSports Pack 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3 / AMD Phenom™ II X2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 9800 GTX / AMD Radeon™ HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2500 / AMD FX 8150
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard

short_description: Put your driving talents to the test with these 6 new races for WRC 5 and discover the WRC Concept Car E2, a brand new car. This content can be used in Quick Rally and Quick Stage modes.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
